home.title: Welcome to Verber
home.subtitle: Learn French verbs through interactive games and challenges

interactiveGames.title: üéÆ Interactive Games
interactiveGames.description: Learn verbs through fun drag-and-drop games, matching exercises, and interactive challenges.

multiplayer.title: üë• Multiplayer Challenges
multiplayer.description: Compete with friends in real-time verb challenges and climb the leaderboards.

trackProgress.title: üìà Track Progress
trackProgress.description: Monitor your learning journey with detailed statistics and personalized progress tracking.

dashboard.chooseGame: Choose a game to start learning

study.title: üìö Study
study.description: Learn verb conjugations and practice at your own pace

play.title: üéÆ Play
play.description: Test your skills with interactive games and challenges

conjugation.title: Conjugation Tables
conjugation.description: View complete conjugation tables for any verb
conjugation.selectVerb: Select a verb to view its conjugations
conjugation.selectVerbDescription: Choose a verb from the dropdown above to display its full conjugation table

practice.comingSoonDescription: This feature is under development. Soon you'll be able to practice specific verbs or tenses with interactive exercises and personalized feedback.
practice.title: Practice Verbs and Tenses
practice.description: Practice specific verbs or tenses at your own pace

games.title: Games
games.subtitle: Choose a game to test your skills

find-error.title: üéØ Find Error
find-error.description: Identify and correct errors in sentences. Perfect for honing your grammar skills.

matching.title: üé¥ Matching Game
matching.description: Match infinitives with their correct conjugated forms. Perfect for visual learners.
matching.instruction: üé¥ Match the verbs with their conjugations!

write-me.title: ‚úçÔ∏è Fill in the Blanks
write-me.description: Complete sentences with the correct verb forms. Practice in context.
write-me.instruction: ‚úçÔ∏è Complete the sentences with the correct verb forms!

race.title: üèÅ Conjugation Race
race.description: Compete against the clock to conjugate verbs correctly. How fast can you go?
race.instruction: üèÅ Conjugate as fast as you can!

random-verb.title: Random Verb Challenge
random-verb.description: Test your conjugation skills with random verbs and tenses!
random-verb.instruction: Conjugate each verb in the given tense

sentence.title: Sentence Challenge
sentence.description: Complete sentences by conjugating verbs in context. Choose your tenses and master real-world usage!
sentence.instruction: Complete the sentence with the correctly conjugated verb

participe.title: üìù Participle
participe.description: Master French participles! Choose between past participle and present participle.
participe.question: What is the {{type}} of:

speedRound.title: ‚ö° Speed Round
speedRound.description: Answer a series of conjugation questions as quickly as possible.

complete.title: üìù Complete Mode
complete.description: Complete training mode with all features enabled.

error.title: Unable to Load Game
error.noData: No game data available. Please return to the game setup and try again.
error.invalidConfig: Invalid game configuration. Please select verbs and tenses before starting.
error.unexpected: An unexpected error occurred while setting up the game:
error.failedToGenerate: Failed to generate game data. Please try again.
error.notEnougthCorrectWords: Not enough correct words found. Please try again.
error.insufficientTenseOptions: Insufficient tense options generated for verb '{{verb}}'.
error.noMatchingSentences: No sentences found matching the selected tenses. Please select different tenses.
error.noVerbsSelected: No verbs selected. Please select at least one verb.
error.noParticipeTypesSelected: No participle types selected. Please select at least one type.

gameRoom.participeTypeHelp: Select one or both types. The game will randomly mix your selected types.
gameRoom.prerequisiteDescription: This game requires a minimum level for an optimal experience:
gameRoom.prerequisiteTip: Add more verbs and tenses to unlock this game and enjoy a richer learning experience!

gameRoom.selectionCompleteParticipe: You have selected {{verbs}} verbs and {{types}} participle types. Perfect for {{game}}!
